thread.title: BRIEF-India's Zensar Technologies Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Zensar Technologies Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls

organizations.name: zensar technologies dec qtr consol profit falls

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Zensar Technologies Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 590.7 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT 800.4 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 7.94 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 7.87 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 5 RUPEES PER SHARE Source text - bit.ly/2EScnab Further company coverage:
